frameset.edef: to come under a topic or event

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (SBAR-NOM-TPC-3 (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينطبق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المعارضين)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I ينضوون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تحت) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سقف) (NP (PUNC ") (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لقاء) (NP (NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قرنة) (NOUN_PROP شهوان)) (PUNC ")))))))))))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينسحب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المقدار)) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نفس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المعارضين)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN الاشد) (NP-ADV (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC جذرية))) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العماد) (NOUN_PROP ميشال) (NOUN_PROP عون)))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: Under the roof of a meeting Shahwan
